scripts.docker:build: docker login --username=divinadocker --password=4TL97uAztkP6wST; VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F= "{ print $2 }" | sed 's/[version:,",]//g'| tr -d '[[:space:]]'); TAG=$(git describe --tags --always); docker build -t aaiello/divina:${VERSION}-${TAG} .
scripts.docker:push: docker login --username=divinadocker --password=4TL97uAztkP6wST; VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F= "{ print $2 }" | sed 's/[version:,",]//g'| tr -d '[[:space:]]'); TAG=$(git describe --tags --always); docker push aaiello/divina:${VERSION}-${TAG}
